channel.title: Help with blocking people from useing cheat clients
channel.description:
Hi,
I need help with making it so people have to use my client or they will be disconnected. Does anyone know how I can do this? If you know how please reply here or private message me on rune locus and tell me how.
Thanks for your help, Poke1103
